attributes.action: Decline United States President Donald Trump access to UK
attributes.additional_details: Any news article featuring Donald Trump. Give it a popular internet search, everything that comes out his face is despicable. http://www.itv.com/news/story/2017-01-27/donald-trump-100-behind-nato-says-theresa-may-after-meeting/
attributes.background: Please sign to stop United States President Donald Trump from entering UK. We need to send a strong and severe message that his kind aren't welcome here. #protectourwomen
